DialogueNodes.Text: You should have accepted my medicine last time!
Why of course. My darling pet secrets a venom that, when in the bloodstream of an adolescent, produces a serum that halt's aging. If only momentarily.
Unfortunately, the process causes rapid aging, bloodshot eyes, decrease in cognitive abilities... oh, I won't bore you with the long list of side effects.
But really you should be thanking me! What was the alternative? Starving on the streets? That is, if they don't pick the flesh of your bones first! Hahahahahahaha
Now my darling little Hans. Would do the honours. [you feel a sharp prick in your neck and everything starts to fade.]
